code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import logo from'../img/logo.png';import'./Navbar.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{LoginContext}from'../context/LoginContext';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=_ref=>{let{login}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const{setModalopen}=useContext(LoginContext);const loginStatus=()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem("jwt");if(login||token){return[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/profile",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Profile"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/createpost",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Create post"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{style:{marginLeft:"20px"},to:"/followingpost",children:"my following"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:" ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"primarybtn",onClick:()=>{setModalopen(true);},children:"LogOut"})})]})];}else{return[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"SignUp"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signin",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"SignIn"})})]})];}};loginStatus();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"img",src:logo,alt:"",onClick:()=>{navigate("/");}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"nav-menu",children:loginStatus()})]});};export default Navbar;
